posts.content:
having done a bit more research i like the colour of the bus in the thread below, it was '65 samba owned by a chap called carl elliot? and seems to be a well know bus? looks like not stock colours but it looks great i think.... does anyone know what colours it was?

viewtopic.php?f=8&t=107054

cheers

Have now decided not go back to plan A and paint bus all one colour ( a vw white) with a view to possible add a matching non white colour in the future..... Has anyone got any thoughts on this? My original idea was pearl white but when we put a coat on it looked a bit greeny which I didn't like.... Am now thinking cumulus white which has a grey tinge to it..... Please let me know your thoughts as it's driving me round the twist!

year...1966...

was panel van... with windows....

Lotus white
Cheers graham, that looks quite nice I guess all polished up would look cool, what non white colour would that match to?

There was a guy on here who had a white bus, trying to think of his username as he had a fair few piccies too.

You could go grey on the bottom half??
Would be nice to see his....
